de.fu.weave
Interface Session

All Known Implementing Classes:
SessionImpl
@Author(value={"Julian Fleischer","Andr\u221a\u00a9 Zoufahl"})
public interface Session

Maintains data about a Users session

Typically such data includes whether the user is logged in or not, at what time he logged in, how long he is logged in already, ...

isUserLoggedIn

boolean isUserLoggedIn()
Check if the Sessions User is logged in or not.

Returns:
true of false

setUser

void setUser(User user)
Associated a user with this session.

setUser will be called by LoginHandler and LogoutHandler. setUser(null) shall set isLoggedIn to false whereas every other user shall set isLoggedIn to true. If a user is newly logged in his data has to be fetched form the database, or the database has to be passed to the newly created User objects so that it can construct itself. Implementation detail. You might use EntityManager.select(...) for this purpose.

Parameters:
user -

              Object value)

value -
